1.title: OUR MISSION
1.text: To offer specialized services for medical and therapeutic assistance, assuming an ethical and social compromise, with an assistance service highly qualified, within the HIGHEST STANDARDS OF PATIENT SAFETY AND HUMAN WARMTH, with our integral health model for our patients and insurers.

3.title: OUR VISION
3.text: To be a company which is a referent in the health market, of absolute reliability within the DOMICILIARY MEDICAL CARE SERVICES within Bogot√° and Cundinamarca; recognized by the quality and excellence of service, satisfying the demand and necessities of our customers, with the highest qualified staff and the latest generation equipment.
